subject: Basketball
Hiring and Promotion
lead_paragraph: Before joining the Nuggets, Mark Warkentien, a former executive of the year, spent 14 years working for the Portland Trail Blazers, Cleveland Cavaliers and Seattle SuperSonics.
snippet: Before joining the Nuggets, Mark Warkentien, a former executive of the year, spent 14 years working for the Portland Trail Blazers, Cleveland Cavaliers and Seattle SuperSonics.
